name: PowrTowr
description:
A tower defence game, where the higher up you build your towers, the more powerful they are.

Click on the little cyllinders to build towers! You can click on the towers to upgrade them further. Enemies drop coins which you can collect by clicking. Coins are used to upgrade towers and build new ones.

Made for Trijam 36, only roughly three hours.

Of course, this isn't close to being something worth playing, but even in this state, the game can get surprisingly addicting
